channel.title: First model ever with metasequoia (except recolours then of course)
channel.description:
hello everybody... i have never been any good at modeling and finally i got something out of my shitty old laptop :P As nobody knows i am a big fan of bleach and i have tryed the last few hours to make his zangetsou... and here it is... sorry for no in-game pictures... i have ubuntu on my computer and i don't know how to run rsps in ubuntu right now... picture :) (YAY)
and b4 pictures i want to tell you i didn't got the handle quite straight so please don't correct me on that :)
right side view [IMG]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt292/kneistol/bleachrigthside.png[/img]
left side view [IMG]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt292/kneistol/leftside.png[/img]
drop view [IMG]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt292/kneistol/dropmodel.png[/img]
handle view [IMG]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt292/kneistol/handle.png[/img]
creditz:
40% to silentCJ for his: how to make basic sword tut 50% to bleach anime for inventing the sword 10% to me for drawing a bad 3D model of the sword :P
and i just want to say: im proud of myself for doing this and for taking one more step into the modeling world
thanks
say if i am supposed to upload it :)

item.title: First model ever with metasequoia (except recolours then of course)
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

ok thx i have made my second model now to… but its not primitive il try to make a primitve model

here i have made a model from just prims is that right??? and is that how everybody are making their models?

Read full topic
item.source: First model ever with metasequoia (except recolours then of course)

item.title: First model ever with metasequoia (except recolours then of course)
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Reyx, the only reason you mentioned #2 was because I made Santa Teresa and that is one huge mofo

Anyways, it’s a good first model, but you should attempt using primitives. It may be tough at first, but you will eventually get the hang of it. If you want, I can post a link to a video of mine showing me making a model in Metasequoia out of primitives. It could be useful to you since it shows ways to manipulate primitives.

Read full topic
item.source: First model ever with metasequoia (except recolours then of course)

item.title: First model ever with metasequoia (except recolours then of course)
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Tips to remember.
1.Don’t trace. In ANY SITUATION, don’t trace. Always go back to primitives, they will save your ass.
2.Don’t make anime swords. If you intend to put these ingame, they always end up really fucking big.
3.Explore. Don’t be afraid to try new stuff that hasn’t been done or may seem like a challenge.

Read full topic
